A Sanctuary within the City's Historic Heart

ABOUT

Discover a new way of living in Emerald of Katong, just a stone’s throw from Tanjong Katong MRT. This upcoming new development offers a peaceful retreat amidst the bustling history and diverse flavors of one of the East’s most cherished neighborhoods. 

A Serenity Escape Awaits

Discover more in our e-brochure about living in a home that offers tranquility amid historical landmarks. 

*information is subject to change and all images used are for illustration purposes only.

Official E-Brochure

DOWNLOAD NOW

Bask in Modern Luxury Amidst Peranakan Charm

LOCATION

Live in the pulse of Katong, where this new and upcoming development blends seamless connectivity with cultural richness. 

5 mins away from MRT stations
  • Tanjong Katong MRT (TE25)
  • Dakota MRT (CCL)
1 km radius to prestigious schools
  • Tanjong Katong Girl’s School 
  • Tanjong Katong Primary School 
  • Canadian International School of Singapore 
  • Haig Girls’ School 
6 mins walk to nearest park
  • Haig Walk
  • Carpmael Park
  • Koon Seng Park
  • East Coast Park
6 mins drive to nearest mall
  • i12 Katong
  • Katong Shopping Centre
  • Parkway Parade
  • PLQ Mall

Embrace Heritage Living

Embrace a lifestyle where history enhances modernity. Download the sitemap to see your new home in a community celebrating its rich heritage.

Real Estate Opportunities in a Thriving District

UNIT MIX

Whether it’s unwinding after a long day at work, seizing a strategic investment opportunity, or giving your family a secure and vibrant place to call home, Emerald of Katong along Jalan Tembusu meets all these needs in a district known for its growth potential.

Reserve Your Exclusive Showroom Preview

Don’t miss your chance for an exclusive sneak peek to Emerald of Katong. Secure your invitation for a private tour of our showroom with more details revealing soon. 

*information is subject to change and all images used are for illustration purposes only.

SECURE VVIP ACCESS

BOOK NOW

DEVELOPER

Established for more than 40 over years,  Sim Lian Group has grown to become one of Singapore’s most respected developers. This is supported by numerous accolades including being ranked amongst the Top 100 Brands in Singapore for five consecutive years from 2009 to 2013 and recognised as a top ten developer in Singapore by BCI Asia in 2015 and 2016. 

 

The Group’s journey has been guided by a philosophy of prime location, impeccable craftsmanship, and thoughtful space utilization, attributes that have earned them a place among Singapore’s top developers. Their strategic leadership and commitment to quality are reflected in a robust portfolio of residential, commercial, and retail developments, making them a trusted name for investors and homeowners alike

*information is subject to change and all images used are for illustration purposes only.

Planning a new home or investment?

Let us help you to estimate your monthly payments, interest rates, and more. Take your first step towards homeownership now!
